channel.title: 3 people left, Alch, Reaper, King. Reaper insta loses during day cycle
channel.description:
What happened: Daytime rolls around, CL dies to reap. Reaper, Alchemist, and Me (King) still alive, game automatically ends as Cult/Alch win without any discussion/voting.
What was supposed to happen: A standard day transpires with the lying liars and the lies they tell trying to kill the rogue elements blocking their win condition.
Steps to reproduce: Possibly because I was replacement king? Also was converted Cult. Have you, reaper and unsure if it's reliant on another neutral being the 3rd wildcard all I know is no one else was apparently reaped, and the game just ended in a Cult/Alchemist win, and Reaper loss.
Comments: None other than the info provided. IGN: OneOfUS if that is helpful to find the game. Have never had that outcome in the 120 hours I've played and have seen many 3 player standoffs with reaper in the mix.
